name: Maximum Override
description:
Maximum Override is a chaotic city destruction game where the machines come alive. Wreak havoc in a fully destructible randomly generated city with anything you can find.
Take over police cars, taxis, helicopters, wrecking balls, bridges, rocket cars, giant robots, UFOs, monster trucks, big rigs, giant globe statues, fire hydrants, vending machines, tanks and more
4 procedural generated fully destructible cities
Full Controller support
Game modes: G man Elimination, Arcade score mode, and a sandbox Zen mode
